com.mesosphere.sdk.testing

Class ClusterState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.testing.ClusterState

  • public class ClusterState
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of the state of a cluster. Effectively a log of prior offers and task launches during a test run.

    • Method Summary

      • getLastOfferCycle

        public java.util.Collection<Protos.Offer> getLastOfferCycle()
        Returns the set of offers received in the last offer cycle.
        Returns:
        the last offer added via #addSentOffer(org.apache.mesos.Protos.Offer) or addSentOffers(Collection)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if no offers had been sent

      • addAcceptCall

        public void addAcceptCall(AcceptEntry pod)
        Adds the provided pod to the list of launched pods.

      • getAcceptCalls

        public java.util.List<AcceptEntry> getAcceptCalls(java.lang.String podName)
        Returns all launch operations where the specified pod was launched, in chronological order.
        Parameters:
        podName - name+index of the pod, of the form "podtype-#"
        Returns:
        a list of accept calls (LAUNCH_GROUP + RESERVE) performed for the specified pod, or an empty list if none were found
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if no such pod was found

      • getLastLaunchedTask

        public LaunchedTask getLastLaunchedTask(java.lang.String taskName)
        Returns the last task launched with the specified name.
        Parameters:
        taskName - the task name to be found
        Returns:
        the task's info
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if no such task was found

      • getTaskId

        public Protos.TaskID getTaskId(java.lang.String taskName)
        Returns the last task id for a task of the specified name.
        Parameters:
        taskName - the task name to be found
        Returns:
        the task id
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if no such task was found
